problem.markdown:
Which of the following statements are true.
[x] A 1T refrigerator cannot be created. [x] A 2T refrigerator must absorb work. [ ] A 3T refrigerator without any work interaction always violates the Second Law. [explanation] A is based on the Kelvin-Planck Statement. B is a derivation. C may not violate the Second Law if it satisfies the Clausius Inequality. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following statements are true.

checkboxgroup.choice: A 3T refrigerator without any work interaction always violates the Second Law.

div.p: A is based on the Kelvin-Planck Statement.
C may not violate the Second Law if it satisfies the Clausius Inequality.
